ygData.subject: Re: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: I like the idea of a trading post, although it would need it to be non-factionist, or separate camps (i.e. gypsies) should be doing the trading. Tenin - Tarew
ygData.messageBody:
I like the idea of a trading post, although it would need it to be
non-factionist, or separate camps (i.e. gypsies) should be doing the
trading.

Tenin - Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Tim West <twest@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 11:16 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Banks


From: "Tim West" <twest@...>



I would like to see bank accounts where you could transfer items and money
into other peoples accounts. It would make trading and selling items with
other people a lot easier. What if you had a friend in Freeport that could
sell you ore. You could put the money in his account, and then they could
put the item in your account. The exchange would not actually take place
until both people agreed on what was being transferred to their account.
This would further the player economy that Verant is trying to encourage.
Another idea would be a trading post where people could put items in and
post a price. If someone wanted to buy the item, they would pay the money
and get the item. The money would then go into the sellers bank account.

Tanaman
12th Level Paladin
Aradani Guild
Veeshan Server.
